at.irian.ankor.switching.connector

Interface ConnectorLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConnectorLoader

    public interface ConnectorLoader
    The ConnectorLoader is responsible for locating and loading pluggable connectors.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadAndInitConnectors(AnkorSystem ankorSystem)
      Look for pluggable connectors, load and initialize them.
      void startAllConnectors()
      Start all loaded connectors.
      void stopAllConnectors()
      Stop all loaded connectors.
      void unloadConnectors()
      Unload all loaded connectors.
